IncomingMessageBroadcaster - Class in main.java.com.hexcore.vrmeeting_hostserver.connection
A threaded class which broadcasts each message received by a connection to all subscribers continually The thread will stop if the connection enters either a stopped state or error state The thread will also stop if ServerComponent.stop() is called
